header.title: Speak Your Mind, And Trust That We Can Deal With It

title: Speak Your Mind, And Trust That We Can Deal With It
content:
When was the last time you actually engaged in a meaningful exchange of thoughts and ideas with people who really are... <!--more--> interested in your point of view on issues that matter?
  Well, that’s how we roll on Leid Stories, and on “Free Your Mind Friday” it’s all about what you have to say.
We’re a good-humored bunch with good manners and a great appreciation for new ideas.
Bring yours to the forum.
Speak your mind.
Trust that we can deal with it.
